entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Fort Nelson
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:26 PM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -30.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fort Nelson Airport 03:00 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -30.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.4 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 70 %
Wind Chill: -34
Dewpoint: -34.4°C
Wind: SSE 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 38.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending before morning then partly cloudy. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 38. Wind chill minus 39 this evening and minus 45 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:43 PM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 30 except minus 26 over southern sections.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon then periods of snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 30 except minus 26 over southern sections. Wind chill minus 43 in the morning and minus 36 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:43 PM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 38.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near midnight then cloudy. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 38. Wind chill minus 36 in the evening and minus 45 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:43 PM MST Friday 23 December 2022
